meaningMnemonic: You have only <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>book</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji>. No other books cross your mind. Only this one book. Why? Because you have such a <vocabulary>one-track mind</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is based off the on'yomi readings for everything, though every reading is slightly altered. いち getting shortened to いっ, ほん changing to ぽん, and き gets changed to ぎ. They're based off the readings you know already, though, so making this shift shouldn't be too hard... that is, unless you have an 一本気, ammiright?
